name: CrossPitch
description:
A snazzy and smooth rhythm based art game inspired by cross stitching.

Controls are the entire qwerty row on your keyboard, as indicated at the top of the screen.

If you don't obsessively play rhythm games, it may take you a minute to get a handle on the controls. That's okay! You can't make mistakes in this game, only happy little accidents. 

Pixel art is just digital cross stitching don't @ me about this hot take.

Music:  Yellow Light Disctrict by Lobo Loco
http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Lobo_Loco/Diversity_of_Life/Yellow_Light_District_ID_1135_1744
